original: Colombian art boasts a rich history spanning over 3,500 years, encompassing a diverse array of media and styles. This artistic tradition includes influences from Spanish Baroque devotional painting, intricate Quimbaya gold craftwork, and the "lyrical Americanism" exemplified by the works of painter Alejandro Obregón (1920–1992).
